author: philip
msg: Fix a case of reading beyond allocated memory with SVN0, i.e. pre-1.4,
deltas.  This was identified by running svnadmin_tests.py 14 for FSFS
over ra_svn with svnserve running under valgrind.
(decode_window): Allocate, copy and add terminating null for SVN0, remove

author: tedyu
msg: HBASE-10995 Fix resource leak related to unclosed HBaseAdmin

author: kihwal
msg: svn merge -c 1587962 from trunk to branch-2 to fix:HDFS-6219. Proxy superuser configuration should use true client IP for address checks. Contributed by Daryn Sharp.
